Discipline [i](This creature gains abilities from its types. Whenever it enters or you put a counter on it, it gains your choice of these types.)[/i]
[b]Cleric[/b] | Whenever a creature you control with a counter attacks, you gain 1 life.
[b]Wizard[/b] | {4}: Put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature you control.
